headline.main: Ukraine Asks U.N. Judges to Order Russia to Stop Aiding Rebels
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Asks U.N. Judges to Order Russia to Stop Aiding Rebels

lead_paragraph: General Motors Co’s deal on Monday to sell its European operations to France's PSA Group doubles down on a bet that the company can win by being less global but more profitable in an auto industry increasingly dependent on software and services.
